content: दयित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [दय्-क्त] Beloved, desired, liked; <ls>Bk. 10. 9.</ls> --तः A husband, lover, a beloved person; <ls>V. 3. 5</ls> <ls>Bv. 2. 182.</ls> --ता A wife, one's beloved woman; दयिताजीवितालंबनार्थी <ls>Me. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 3</ls>; <ls>Bv. 2. 182</ls>; <ls>Ki. 6. 13</ls>; दयिताजितः ‘a hen-pecked husband’.
